title: 이중 접속사 활용
description: 이중 접속사 활용을 연습합니다. CORRELATIVE-CONJUNCTIONS 패턴을 활용하여 고급 영어 표현을 익힙니다.
examples: She is not only smart but also hardworking.
We have tea as well as coffee.
Along with the report, I sent an email.
learning_points: conjunction 관련 고급 표현과 실용적 활용

sentences.en: She is not only smart but also hardworking.
We have tea as well as coffee.
Along with the report, I sent an email.
He plays not only piano but also guitar.
Along with experience, passion is also needed.

sentences.kr: 그 회사는 품질뿐만 아니라 서비스도 훌륭합니다.
sentences.en: The company has not only quality but also excellent service.
Along with salary, we receive welfare benefits.
You need not only skill but also luck.
